title: Joint use of facilities
context: ยง103D-805 Joint use of facilities. Any public procurement unit may enter into agreements for the common use or lease of warehousing facilities, capital equipment, and other facilities with another public procurement unit or an external procurement unit under the terms agreed upon between the parties. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of ยง2; am L 1998, c 11, ยง10]
